name: Retro Bit´s
description:
Controls:

P2: W↑                  -                            S↓ 

P1: UpArrow↑  -  DownArrow ↓

This is a game, that´s meant to be a mix between the two original arcade games "Pong" and "Breakout", and at the same time have it´s own kind of twist. I think the game has turned out pretty good, and really hope you enjoy playing it. 

I´m open to feedback, and really hope to see you guess commenting, on the game with both what you think, and what you think is missing
